data.title: Jean Renoir Andre Bazin
data.meta_description: Jean-Renoir-Andre-Bazin.docx - Free ebook download as Word Doc (.doc / .docx), PDF File (.pdf), Text File (.txt) or read book online for free. This document provides an introduction to and overview of Andre Bazin's unfinished book on renowned French film director Jean Renoir. It discusses Bazin's career as a film critic and the influence he had on the French New Wave filmmakers. It describes how Bazin's friends helped complete the manuscript after his death, organizing it into 10 chronological chapters on Renoir's work. The introduction gives high praise to both Bazin and Renoir, calling this the best book written by the best critic about the best director. It presents Bazin as having a deep sympathy for and understanding of Renoir's films and philosophy of life.
